content: i designed this grocery bag holder to be modern functional and beautiful the intricate design is surprisingly easy to create and will make you want to put it somewhere on display rather than hiding it away in the pantry they also make great market items as they sell extremely well supplies needed -5 mm size h hook -regular sized hair elastic preferably a new one the thicker kind you don t want it to be stretched out -150-175 yards of dk weight size 3 or worsted weight size 4 yarn i used lion brand comfy cotton blend -a 15-20 mm wooden bead optional -scissors tape measure yarn needle terminology and abbreviations used pattern is written in us terminology beginning - beg chain s - chain s double_crochet - double_crochet fasten_off fo half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet single_crochet single_crochet skip - skip slip_stitch - slip_stitch space es - space s stitch es - st s treble_crochet - treble_crochet v_stitch - vst gauge gauge is not essential for this project but i do give my diameter measurement after round 2 to give you a baseline measurement finished measurements bag saver will stretch quite a lot with bags inside but the approximate measurement 4 5 wide x 24 long
